articles.description: Jurors in the rape trial of Man City player Benjamin Mendy were today quizzed on whether they knew five other stars - as they were told they could be mentioned or witnesses in the case.
articles.content:
Jurors in the rape trial of Man City player Benjamin Mendy were today quizzed on whether they knew five other stars - as they were told they could be mentioned or witnesses in the case.
